languages.text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Each time the wielder spends 10 stacks of Tactical Advantage, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Resolve{/g} until end of combat.
Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.
Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: 装备者每消耗10层“战术优势”，就会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每消耗10层“战术优势”，就会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 着用者が戦術的優位を10スタック消費するたびに、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を1得る。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が戦術的優位を10スタック消費するたびに、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を1得る。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador gasta 10 acumulaciones de ventaja táctica, gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador gasta 10 acumulaciones de ventaja táctica, gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Träger 10 Einheiten von Taktischer Vorteil ausgibt, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Träger 10 Einheiten von Taktischer Vorteil ausgibt, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text: Расходуя 10 уровней тактического преимущества, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of tactical advantage, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Расходуя 10 уровней тактического преимущества, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur dépense 10 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique, il bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur dépense 10 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique, il bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
